com.paypal.android.sdk.payments
Class PayPalFuturePaymentActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalFuturePaymentActivity

public final class PayPalFuturePaymentActivity
extends Activity

Primary Activity for getting user consent for PayPal Future Payments with the PayPal Android SDK. Integration point for third party applications.

Responsible for the initiating the PayPal login, providing agreement details, and returning the PayPalAuthorization result in EXTRA_RESULT_AUTHORIZATION. You should not attempt to interact with any other activity in this SDK for PayPal Future Payments.

The activity will have android.app.Activity#RESULT_OK if the user authenticated with PayPal and agreed, or android.app.Activity#RESULT_CANCELED if the user canceled it. If your app submits an invalid request, it may return RESULT_EXTRAS_INVALID. All other errors will be handled by the SDK.

Field Summary
static String EXTRA_RESULT_AUTHORIZATION
          A PayPalAuthorization parcelable extra containing authorization code from PayPal representing your user's consent to future payments.
static int RESULT_EXTRAS_INVALID
          A resultCode returned to indicate that the PayPalConfiguration object provided when the service was started is not valid.

Field Detail

RESULT_EXTRAS_INVALID

public static final int RESULT_EXTRAS_INVALID
A resultCode returned to indicate that the PayPalConfiguration object provided when the service was started is not valid. The login was not attempted. PayPal UI will not be presented.

EXTRA_RESULT_AUTHORIZATION

public static final String EXTRA_RESULT_AUTHORIZATION
A PayPalAuthorization parcelable extra containing authorization code from PayPal representing your user's consent to future payments. This should be sent to your server and used when making future payment requests later.
